contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|hove}} [[Hove]] is a town in [[East Sussex]]. It may also refer to: ==People== * [[Chenjerai Hove]] (born 1956), a Zimbabwean writer * [[Joachim van den Hove]] (1567?–1620), a Flemish composer * [[Léon Van Hove]] (born 1924), a physicist, former CERN Director General :* [[Van Hove singularity]], phenomenon named after him * [[Martin van den Hove]] (1605–1639), a Dutch astronomer * [[Peter van Hove]] (died 1793), a Flemish theologian ==Places== * [[Hove (UK Parliament constituency)]] * [[Hove Festival]], a music festival in Norway * [[Hove, Belgium]], a municipality in Belgium * [[Hove, South Australia]], a suburb in Adelaide, Australia * a part of a small German city, [[Jork]] * [[Hove Mobile Park, North Dakota]] * [[Hawaiian Ocean View Estates, Hawaii]], (HOVE) a real estate development on Hawai{{okina}}i Island now known as Ocean View, Hawaii ==Nautical== Past tense of "heave" * [[Careening|Hove down]] Heave a ship onto its side to examine, clean or repair its keel * [[Heaving to|Hove to]] To stop or slow down a ship's forward motion. {{disambiguation}}
